channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft PowerPoint
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft PowerPoint

item.title: CVE-2017-8513|2024-08-05T16:41:22.290Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20powerpoint
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft PowerPoint when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft PowerPoint Remote Code Execution Vulnerability".
